com.xdatasystem.contactsimporter
Class ContactListImporterImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.xdatasystem.contactsimporter.ContactListImporterImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContactListImporter
Direct Known Subclasses:
GmailImporter, HotmailImporter
public abstract class ContactListImporterImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContactListImporter

Abstract, general implementation of ContactListImporter. It provides usefull methods when importing contacts from a service. Subclass this class to implement a service specific contactsimporter.

Author:
Tjerk Wolterink

public java.util.List<Contact> getContactList()
                                       throws ContactListImporterException
Description copied from interface: ContactListImporter
Retrieves all contacts. This may take some time because first the user must be logged in, and then the contact list must be retrieved.

Specified by:

readInputStream

protected java.lang.String readInputStream(java.io.InputStream is)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Reads an inputstream and converts it to a string. Note that this is rather memory intensive, if you do not need random access in the inputstream you should iterate sequentially over the lines using readLine()

Parameters:
is - the inputstream to convert
Returns:
the content of the input stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if reading the inputstream fails

isConformingEmail

public static boolean isConformingEmail(java.lang.String email,
                                        java.lang.String[] domains)
Wether the email ends with one of the domains in the domains list.

Parameters:
email - the email tot test
domains - a list of domains.
Returns:
true if the email ends with one of the domains in the domains list
